denest.utils.validation¶

Validation and update of parameters dictionaries.

exception denest.utils.validation.ParameterError¶

Bases: ValueError

Raised when there is an error with parameters

exception denest.utils.validation.ReservedParameterError¶

Bases: denest.utils.validation.ParameterError

Raised when parameter dictionary contains a reserved parameter.

exception denest.utils.validation.MissingParameterError¶

Bases: denest.utils.validation.ParameterError

Raised when a mandatory parameter is missing.

exception denest.utils.validation.UnrecognizedParameterError¶

Bases: denest.utils.validation.ParameterError

Raised when a parameter is not recognized.

exception denest.utils.validation.MissingChildNodeError¶

Bases: ValueError

Raised when a child Params node is missing.

exception denest.utils.validation.UnrecognizedChildNodeError¶

Bases: ValueError

Raised when a child Params node is not recognized.

denest.utils.validation.validate_children(tree, mandatory_children=None, optional_children=None)¶

Validate a ParamsTree node children.

Parameters

tree (ParamsTree) – The tree we’re validating. Missing children are added in place as empty ParamsTree nodes.

Kwargs:
mandatory_children (list(str) | None): None or the list of names of

children nodes that are expected in the tree. Ignored if None

optional_children (list(str) | None): None or the list of names of

children nodes that are optional in the tree. Ignored if None. If missing, empty children ParamsTree are added in place.

denest.utils.validation.validate(name, params, param_type='params', reserved=None, mandatory=None, optional=None)¶

Validate and set default values for parameter dictionary.

Parameters

  • name (str) – Name of the object we’re validating

  • params (dict-like) – Parameter dictionary to validate.

Kwargs:
param_type (str): Type of parameter dictionary we’re validating.

‘params’ or ‘nest_params’

reserved (list(str) | None): List of “reserved” parameters that

shouldn’t be present in params. Ignored if None.

mandatory (list(str) | None): List of parameters that are

expected in the dictionary. Ignored if None.

optional (dict | None): Dict of parameters that are

recognized but optional, along with their default value. Ignored if None. If not None, the list of recognized parameters is mandatory + optional and we throw an error if one of the params is not recognized. Optional parameters missing from params are added along with their default value.

Returns

The parameter dictionary updated with default values.

Return type

params
